rules.title: Atomicity
rules.description: An atomic requirement MUST describe exactly one action.

rules.title: Binding Modality
rules.description: Only binding modal verbs are allowed for atomic requirements.

rules.title: Explicit Actor
rules.description: An atomic requirement MUST specify a single, explicit actor.

rules.title: Action Clarity
rules.description: The action MUST be expressed as a clear verb phrase and MUST NOT contain multiple verbs.

rules.title: Optional Condition
rules.description: Conditions are optional, but if present MUST describe a single triggering context.

rules.title: Result Consistency
rules.description: If a result is specified, it MUST describe a single, observable outcome.
